      • onFlickArrival

        public void onFlickArrival(FlickMessage message)
        Description copied from class: SynergyNetApp
        Retrieves details from the supplied message to recreate the flicked item and to ensure it appears onscreen in the manner expected, i.e. aligning with its flick vector from its source device.
        Overrides:
        onFlickArrival in class SynergyNetApp
        Parameters:
        message - Structured message detailing the details of an item's arrival.

      • shouldStart

        public void shouldStart(MultiTouchInputComponent input,
               IQueueOwner iqo)
        Description copied from class: SynergyNetApp
        Executed at the start of each application which extended the SynergyNetApp. This method first tidies any unused files from the synergynet cache. The method then sets up the default feedback types to be used in SynergyNetApps and records the display dimensions. The screen capture function is then initialised and login menus are created for any waiting students. Following this the controller which listens for appropriate changes in the HazelCast Cluster is initialised. The application's main environment construction is then called and finally the media searching threads are started.
        Specified by:
        shouldStart in interface IMultiplicityApp
        Overrides:
        shouldStart in class SynergyNetApp
        Parameters:
        input - The multi-touch input providing component.
        iqo - Queue owner.

      • shouldStop

        public void shouldStop()
        Description copied from class: SynergyNetApp
        Called when a SynergyNetApp extending application is closed through traditional means. All students present art logged out, the media searches are stopped and the table announces its removal to the network. Any unused files are then removed from the cache.
        Specified by:
        shouldStop in interface IMultiplicityApp
        Overrides:
        shouldStop in class SynergyNetApp
